synonyms: kānāñi-khuṭiyā—Kānāñi Khuṭiyā; āchena—is; nanda-veśa dhari'-in the dress of Nanda Mahārāja; jagannātha-māhāti—Jagannātha Māhāti; hañāchena—was; vrajeśvarī—mother Yaśodā.
translation: Kānāñi Khuṭiyā dressed himself like Nanda Mahārāja, and Jagannātha Māhāti dressed himself as mother Yaśodā.
